title: Taylor Swift albums discography
summary: American singer-songwriter Taylor Swift has released 9 original studio albums, 2 re-recorded studio albums, 6 extended plays (EP), 3 live albums, and 14 compilations. One of the best-selling music artists, she has sold an estimated 114 million album units worldwide.[1][2] As of 2019, her US albums sales stood at 37.3 million[3] and her UK albums sales 3.34 million.[4] According to the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA), Swift has accumulated 46 million certified album units in the United States.[5] As of November 2021, she is the woman with the most weeks (55) at number one on the US Billboard 200.[6]
